title: NIMHANS Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 03 Project Nurse Posts
description: National Institute of Mental Health and Neuro Sciences (NIMHANS) has declared the latest notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 03 Project Technical Support and Project Junior Nurse Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Any Degree, GNM, and ANM can grab this chance and apply for the NIMHANS Recruitment 2025. Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible c...
